trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> objects.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods enable you to add and remove individual controls from the collection.

You can also use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> methods to add or remove all the controls from the collection.

You can determine whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is a member of the collection by passing the control into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Contains%2A> method.

To get the index value of the location of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> in the collection, pass the control into the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
The collection can be copied into an array by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.CopyTo%2A> method.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> class with the specified container <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> and the specified array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> controls.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip"></xref> to which this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> belongs.
An array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> containing the initial controls for this <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref>.
The owner parameter is `null`.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the specified image to the collection.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the specified text to the collection.
The text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
Adds the specified item to the end of the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> to add to the end of the collection.
An <xref href="System.Int32"></xref> representing the zero-based index of the new item in the collection.
The value parameter is `null`.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the specified image and text to the collection.
The text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.

Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> that displays the specified image and text to the collection and that raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"></xref> event.
The text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Click"></xref> event.
The new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
Adds an array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> controls to the collection.

Use this overload of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> to copy a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> array to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>.

Use the overload of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> parameter to merge one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> with another.
An array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> controls.
The toolStripItems parameter is `null`.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> is read-only.
Adds a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> to the current collection.
Use this overload of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> to merge one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> with another.

You typically use this method with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripOverflow>, and you can easily use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Insert%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A> methods to modify the merged <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>.

Use the overload of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> that takes a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> array to copy an array of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> controls to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> to be added to the current collection.
The toolStripItems parameter is `null`.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> is read-only.
Removes all items from the collection.
Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> method to remove the entire collection of controls from a parent control.
To remove an individual control from the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.

To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> controls to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> is read-only.
Determines whether the specified item is a member of the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> to search for in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> is a member of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether the collection contains an item with the specified key.
The `key` parameter value corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
The key to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref>.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> contains a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> with the specified key; otherwise, `false`.
Copies the collection into the specified position of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> array.
The array of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> to which to copy the collection.
The position in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> array at which to paste the collection.
Searches for items by their name and returns an array of all matching controls.
The item name to search the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> for.
`true` to search child items of the specified by the key parameter; otherwise, `false`.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> array of the search results.
The key parameter is `null` or empty.
Retrieves the index of the specified item in the collection.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref>.

A zero-based index value that represents the position of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref>, if found; otherwise, -1.
Retrieves the index of the first occurrence of the specified item within the collection.
The `key` parameter value corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.

If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.IndexOfKey%2A> is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.
The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> to search for.
A zero-based index value that represents the position of the first occurrence of the specified by the key parameter, if found; otherwise, -1.
Inserts the specified item into the collection at the specified index.
The location in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> at which to insert the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> to insert.
The value parameter is `null`.
Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> is read-only.
`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> is read-only; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the item at the specified index.
The zero-based index of the item to get.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> located at the specified position in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref>.
Gets the item with the specified name.
The name of the item to get.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> with the specified name.
Removes the specified item from the collection.
When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>, all subsequent controls are moved up one position in the collection.

You can also remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method, or remove all controls by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> method.

To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> methods.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> is read-only.
Removes an item from the specified index in the collection.
When a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> is removed from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>, all subsequent controls are moved up one position in the collection.

You can also remove a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Remove%2A> method, or remove all controls by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Clear%2A> method.

To add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem> objects to the collection, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection.AddRange%2A> methods.
The index value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> to remove.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> is read-only.
Removes the item that has the specified key.
The `key` parameter value corresponds to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Name%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
The key of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> to remove.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection"></xref> is read-only.
Adds an item to the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The item to add to the collection.
The location at which value was inserted.
Removes all items from the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
Determines if the collection contains a specified item.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The item to locate in the collection.
`true` if value is contained in the collection; otherwise, `false`.
Determines the location of a specified item in the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The item to locate in the collection.
The index of the item in the collection, if found; otherwise, -1.
Inserts an item into the collection at a specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index at which to insert value.
The item to insert into the collection.
Gets a value indicating whether the collection has a fixed size.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
`true` if the collection has a fixed size; otherwise, `false`.
Retrieves the element at the specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index of the item to get.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem"></xref> at the specified index.
Removes the first occurrence of a specified item from the collection.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The item to remove from the collection.
Removes an item from the collection at a specified index.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface.
The zero-based index of the item to remove.
